original_title: Y es así. Una mirada al movimiento lésbico feminista en México
overview: A journey through the history of the lesbian rights movement in Mexico, from its beginnings to the present, as told through the experiences of the members of Clóset de Sor Juana, an organization founded in 1992. Archival material complement this story of the past and present of a movement.
title: And So It Is: A Look at the Lesbian Feminist Movement in Mexico
